statements: SELECT * FROM underwriting_criteria;
SELECT applicant_name, age FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT id, credit_score FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE age < 30;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 700;
SELECT applicant_name, income FROM underwriting_criteria ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, age, income FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND credit_score > 700;
SELECT id, applicant_name, credit_score FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE income >= 60000 ORDER BY credit_score DESC, applicant_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT age FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE credit_score < 600;
SELECT id, applicant_name, income FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE age >= 30 AND credit_score < 650 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingCriteria;
SELECT id, criteria_name FROM UnderwritingCriteria WHERE id = 1;
SELECT criteria_name FROM UnderwritingCriteria WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PolicyApproval WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT policy_id, approval_status FROM PolicyApproval WHERE underwriting_criteria_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingCriteria WHERE id = 1;
SELECT criteria_name, criteria_description FROM UnderwritingCriteria WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY criteria_name DESC;
SELECT uc.criteria_name, pa.approval_status FROM UnderwritingCriteria uc JOIN PolicyApproval pa ON uc.id = pa.underwriting_criteria_id WHERE pa.approval_status = 'APPROVED';
SELECT * FROM PolicyApproval pa JOIN UnderwritingCriteria uc ON pa.underwriting_criteria_id = uc.id WHERE uc.criteria_description LIKE '%risk%';

SELECT uc.criteria_name, COUNT(pa.policy_id) AS total_approved_policies FROM PolicyApproval pa JOIN UnderwritingCriteria uc ON pa.underwriting_criteria_id = uc.id WHERE pa.approval_status = 'APPROVED' GROUP BY uc.criteria_name ORDER BY total_approved_policies DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, policy_type, policy_amount FROM policy;
SELECT approval_id, policy_id, approval_date, decision FROM policy_approval WHERE decision = 'approved';
SELECT criteria_id, criteria_name FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE criteria_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, policy_type FROM policy WHERE policy_amount > 1000;
SELECT approval_id, policy_id, approval_date FROM policy_approval ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE criteria_id = 1
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, policy_amount FROM policy WHERE policy_type = 'Health'
SELECT criteria_name, criteria_description FROM underwriting_criteria ORDER BY criteria_name DESC
SELECT policy_id, approval_date, decision FROM policy_approval ORDER BY approval_date ASC
SELECT p.policy_id, p.policy_holder, a.decision FROM policy p JOIN policy_approval a ON p.policy_id = a.policy_id
SELECT * FROM Underwriters;
SELECT Name, Department FROM Underwriters ORDER BY Department DESC;
SELECT TypeName FROM PolicyTypes WHERE TypeID = 2;
SELECT Policies.PolicyID, Policies.Approved, Criteria.CriteriaName FROM Policies JOIN Criteria ON Policies.CriteriaID = Criteria.CriteriaID;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE PolicyType IN (SELECT TypeID FROM PolicyTypes WHERE TypeName = 'Health Insurance');
SELECT * FROM Underwriters;
SELECT Name, Department FROM Underwriters WHERE Department='Sales';

SELECT Policies.PolicyID, Policies.PolicyType, Policies.Approved, PolicyTypes.TypeName, Criteria.CriteriaName FROM Policies JOIN PolicyTypes ON Policies.PolicyType = PolicyTypes.TypeID JOIN Criteria ON Policies.CriteriaID = Criteria.CriteriaID;

SELECT Policies.PolicyID, Policies.PolicyType, Policies.Approved, PolicyTypes.TypeName, Criteria.CriteriaName FROM Policies JOIN PolicyTypes ON Policies.PolicyType = PolicyTypes.TypeID JOIN Criteria ON Policies.CriteriaID = Criteria.CriteriaID WHERE Policies.Approved = TRUE;

SELECT Policies.PolicyID, Policies.PolicyType, Policies.Approved, PolicyTypes.TypeName, Criteria.CriteriaName FROM Policies JOIN PolicyTypes ON Policies.PolicyType = PolicyTypes.TypeID JOIN Criteria ON Policies.CriteriaID = Criteria.CriteriaID WHERE Criteria.CriteriaName = 'Risk Assessment';
SELECT * FROM Underwriters;
SELECT name, email FROM Underwriters WHERE underwriter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT applicant_id, name, age FROM Applicants WHERE income >= 50000;
SELECT Policies.policy_number, Criteria.age_requirement FROM Policies JOIN Criteria ON Policies.policy_id = Criteria.criteria_id;
SELECT * FROM Underwriters WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT underwriter_id, name, email FROM Underwriters WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT Policies.policy_id, Policies.policy_number, Applicants.name FROM Policies JOIN Applicants ON Policies.policy_id = Applicants.policy_id;
SELECT Criteria.criteria_id, Criteria.age_requirement, Criteria.income_requirement FROM Criteria WHERE age_requirement >= 18 AND income_requirement >= 50000.00;

SELECT Applications.application_id, Applications.application_date, Applicants.name, Criteria.age_requirement FROM Applications JOIN Applicants ON Applications.applicant_id = Applicants.applicant_id JOIN Criteria ON Applications.criteria_id = Criteria.criteria_id;
